# Documentation Index

Welcome to the `arrayops` documentation! This directory contains comprehensive documentation for the project.

## Quick Start

New to `arrayops`? Start here:

1. Read the main [README.md](../README.md) for an overview
2. Check out [Examples](examples.md) for usage patterns
3. Refer to [API Reference](api.md) for function documentation

## Documentation Structure

- **[API Reference](api.md)** - Complete API documentation

  - Basic operations
  - Real-world use cases

  - ETL pipeline examples
  - Performance optimization tips
  - Best practices

- **[Performance Guide](performance.md)** - Performance analysis
  - Benchmark results
  - Performance characteristics
  - Optimization tips
  - Memory usage patterns

- **[Troubleshooting](troubleshooting.md)** - Common issues and solutions
  - Installation issues
  - Runtime errors
  - Build problems
  - Platform-specific issues
  - Debugging tips

## Documentation Standards

All documentation follows these principles:

- **Clear and concise**: Easy to understand
- **Code examples**: Practical, runnable examples
- **Cross-references**: Links between related topics
- **Up-to-date**: Kept current with code changes
- **Comprehensive**: Covers all aspects of the project

## Contributing to Documentation

Documentation improvements are welcome! See the [Contributing Guide](contributing.md) for details.

When updating documentation:
- Keep examples up-to-date
- Add cross-references where helpful
- Update related docs when making changes
- Test code examples before committing
